tldr_by_pl.DSP Core PL1: Core bidding engine gains real-time optimization and improved budget pacing algorithms; new targeting capabilities include contextual targeting and cross-channel frequency capping; dashboard performance increases 40% for faster campaign monitoring.
tldr_by_pl.Audiences PL2: Audience targeting enhancements with HCP segment builder featuring NPI targeting and specialty physician filters for cardiology campaigns; patient journey mapping capabilities for oncology audiences with enhanced overlap analysis using Venn diagrams; bulk audience upload functionality via CSV with validation streamlines campaign setup workflows.
tldr_by_pl.DSP Core PL3: Attribution capabilities expand with cross-device graph matching and multi-touch model configuration; reporting dashboard enhances with custom date ranges, automated scheduling, and resolved export timeouts for large campaigns.
tldr_by_pl.DSP Core PL5: Core platform adds real-time inventory forecasting and programmatic guaranteed deals for CTV publishers; targeting enhancements include household demographics for OTT campaigns and creative preview capabilities; infrastructure upgrades support VAST 4.2 ad serving standard.
tldr_by_pl.Developer Experience: New REST and GraphQL APIs enable comprehensive campaign and audience management capabilities; enhanced API reliability through improved rate limiting and webhook notifications for real-time status updates.

body_by_pl.DSP Core PL1:
Bidding Engine Improvements

Value Add:
• Real-time bidding optimization automatically adjusts campaign strategies to maximize performance and ROI across all active campaigns.
• Frequency capping prevents ad oversaturation by controlling impression limits across all channels, improving user experience and campaign effectiveness.

General Availability

Targeting Enhancements

Value Add:
• Contextual targeting capabilities enable more precise audience reach by analyzing page content and environment for better ad placement relevance.

Feature Flag

Performance Optimization

Value Add:
• Campaign dashboard performance improvements deliver 40% faster load times, enabling quicker decision-making and enhanced user productivity.

General Availability

Budget Management

Value Add:
• Enhanced budget pacing algorithm ensures optimal spend distribution during weekend traffic patterns, preventing budget waste and improving campaign consistency.

General Availability
body_by_pl.Audiences PL2:
HCP Targeting

Value Add:
• Build highly targeted healthcare professional audiences using NPI-based physician identification and specialty filters for cardiology campaigns.
• Map patient journeys specifically for oncology audiences to optimize treatment pathway engagement strategies.
• Create precise physician segments that align with therapeutic area campaigns and regulatory requirements.

General Availability

Audience Analytics

Value Add:
• Visualize audience overlap relationships through interactive Venn diagrams to identify segment redundancies and optimize targeting efficiency.
• Make data-driven decisions about audience consolidation and campaign reach expansion based on clear overlap insights.

General Availability

Audience Management

Value Add:
• Upload thousands of audience records simultaneously via CSV files with built-in validation to ensure data quality and reduce manual entry time.
• Scale audience creation processes while maintaining data integrity through automated validation checks.

General Availability
body_by_pl.DSP Core PL3:
DSP Core PL3 Release 2

Attribution & Measurement

Value Add:
• Cross-device graph matching now connects user interactions across multiple devices to provide complete campaign attribution visibility.
• Multi-touch attribution model configuration enables customizable credit assignment across touchpoints to optimize campaign performance.

General Availability

Reporting Enhancements

Value Add:
• Custom date range selection in reporting dashboards delivers flexible analysis periods tailored to specific campaign timeframes.
• Automated report scheduling with email delivery streamlines routine reporting workflows and ensures stakeholders receive timely updates.
• Resolved data export timeouts for large campaign reports to enable comprehensive dataset analysis without interruption.

General Availability
